page.title: 04St John the Baptist Church.
page.content: This church in Danescourt is over 100 yrs old, but there was no regular vicar here in the 19th century. The vicar now is Rev. W. G. Barlow and he has been here for 3 yrs. He is also vicar of Christ Church, Radyr Chain. There are regular services every Sunday, and sometimes in the evenings on weekdays. The average congragation for the 9:15 am Eucharist service on Sundays is about 70. Other services held here are Eucharists on Saints days, marriages, baptisms, and funerals, but confirmations take place at Christ Church because there are so many candidates. The parents of the writer, Roald Dahl, are buried in the churchyard.
